headline: Ian Bremmer reveals why stocks are shrugging off US strikes on Iran nuclear sites
summary: Stocks (^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC) are posting muted gains despite Iran threatening retaliation for the US airstrikes on its key nuclear sites. Eurasia Group founder and president Ian Bremmer explains why in the video above. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid here.
